name: Circuit
description: Circuit is an oscilloscope-themed robot who is part of the WebtrES club. With its vibrant orange box, classic arms and legs, and a stylish red and black screen, Circuit stands out among its robotic peers. It is equipped with a set of shiny shades as an add-on, giving it a cool and mysterious look. This unique combination of features makes Circuit both eye-catching and functional in its role as an oscilloscope robot.
